text: The France men's national 3x3 team is the 3x3 basketball team representing France in international men's competitions, organized and run by the Fédération Française de Basket-Ball. ==Senior Competitions== ===Performance at World Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year ! !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| |- | 2012 || Runner Up ||9||7||2 |- | 2014 ||colspan=4 align=center| DNQ |} ===Performance at Europe Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font- size=85%" |- !rowspan=2|Year !colspan=4|Final tournament !rowspan=4| !colspan=3|Qualifier |- ! !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| !width=25px| |- | 2014||colspan=4| DNP |0 |0 |0 |} == See also == * Fédération Française de Basket-Ball * France national basketball team * France women's national 3x3 team * France mixed national 3x3 team == References == == External links == *Spanish Basketball Federation website Category:France national basketball team Category:National 3x3 basketball teams
title: France men's national 3x3 team
